entry.source: I would like to get my hands on an Enigma{F801}{F804,5}{F873,1}.{F804,0} I've heard a song that says one{F801}of these demons will make a woman beautiful{F801}as long as you keep its toilet clean. I'm{F801}intrigued... but I can't get the demon fusion{F801}right. Can you get me one of these demons?{F801}
